definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在农业中占很大部分的是种植业和畜牧业。

sentences.english: Even now, raising cattle is still one of the  leading branches of economy.
sentences.chinese: 即使时至今日，畜牧业仍然是经济的主要部门之一。

sentences.english: My county is agricultural large county, stock raising is one of main economy origin of the farmer.
sentences.chinese: 我县是农业大县，畜牧业是农民的主要经济来源之一。

sentences.english: Second, we must link the work of agriculture and animal husbandry practice, focus, practical results.
sentences.chinese: 二要联系农牧业工作实际，突出重点，取得实效。

sentences.english: China is famous for his stockbreeding all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我国是世界上畜牧业资源最丰富的国家之一。

sentences.english: Li Changqing, general manager of Xinda Husbandry Company based in Henan, said the case would severely damage the whole industry.
sentences.chinese: 河南新大牧业总经理李长青担忧，此事会毁全行业。

sentences.english: Tourism stockbreeding is the important component of tourism agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 观光畜牧业是观光农业的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Farming in New Zealand is highly mechanized .
sentences.chinese: 牧业在新西兰是高度机械化的。

sentences.english: Poultry industry plan money work made important contribution to drive stock raising to develop.
sentences.chinese: 畜牧行业计财工作为推动畜牧业发展作出了重要贡献。

sentences.english: They depended on animal husbandry for their livelihood.
Livestock husbandry in grassland is the preponderant industry in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 草原畜牧业是内蒙古的优势产业和基础产业。

sentences.english: Meat rabbit industry is a very good feed-saving animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 肉兔产业是一个很好的节粮型畜牧业。

sentences.english: Grass is the food of livestock, and is the material foundation of the development of stockbreeding .
sentences.chinese: 牧草是家畜的食粮，是畜牧业发展的物质基础。

sentences.english: It suggested that lamb fattening is an efficient way for animal production grassland.
sentences.chinese: 证明进行肉羔业生产是草地畜牧业生产中的有效措施。

sentences.english: Prices go up, farming gets more profitable, and farmers grow more food.
sentences.chinese: 价格上涨，农牧业利润更高，于是农民生产更多粮食。

sentences.english: Hongyuan:Hongyuan is the only complete grassland farming county in A Ba which is Tibet's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 红原红原是阿坝州唯一的以藏族聚居为主的纯牧业县。

definition: cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
Aohan banner or Aokhan khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia
